tool.name: cleanupTool

param.name: sourcemetadata
param.dialogReference: This should be the full path to a standalone XML metadata document or a dataset with an existing metadata document that has already been upgraded to ArcGIS Metadata format.

param.name: out_metadata
param.dialogReference: This should be the full path to the standalone XML metadata document that will be produced using this tool. Please review and verify the output before importing it to a dataset or harvesting to a metadata catalog.

tool.summary: This tool performs several extra cleanup steps including copying legacy UUIDs to the ISO-Compliant element and cleaning up all legacy elements.
tool.usage: This tool is recommended for records that have already been upgraded to ArcGIS Metadata.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool performs several extra cleanup steps including copying legacy UUIDs to the ISO-Compliant element and cleaning up all legacy elements.
